member.name: MF_MEDIA_ENGINE_CANPLAY
member.summary: Specifies the likelihood that the Media Engine can play a specified type of media resource.

member.name: MF_MEDIA_ENGINE_CANPLAY.MF_MEDIA_ENGINE_CANPLAY_NOT_SUPPORTED
member.summary: The Media Engine cannot play the resource.

member.name: MF_MEDIA_ENGINE_CANPLAY.MF_MEDIA_ENGINE_CANPLAY_MAYBE
member.summary: The Media Engine might be able to play the resource.

member.name: MF_MEDIA_ENGINE_CANPLAY.MF_MEDIA_ENGINE_CANPLAY_PROBABLY
member.summary: The Media Engine can probably play the resource.
